live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Current estimated time of resolution is 9:30 PM PT.
31152.summary: Some customers in Guildford area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31152.title: Dec 29 - Surrey (Guildford) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
